The researcher is the same thing that we counted as a book that is among the sentences that stigmatized the argument of the explanation and between a sentence (so they are shocked).And the extension of this syntax with their flags is that God does not hide anything from them from their work, so nothing of their bodies is not called upon them, but he does not hold them accountable for them; What he mentioned here and what was not mentioned, as if it was said: They were not hoping for an account and lied to our verses, and they did what except for that and all of us.And we (all) stabbed the activity of (our counters) on the way of being worked with its guarantee.And statistics: the calculation of the things to the plot of its number, for statistics is a tip of the fibrillation and the argument.And it was applied (a book) on the verb of the divorced (we counted) and the estimation: the count of a book, so it is a source in the sense of the book, and it is a coffin from the severity.Because the things that are written from the forgetfulness and the omission, by adopting it as a fabric from the Dabat, it came as a reaction to (our counted).
